meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a grandfather.
meanings.sent1: My grampy tells the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grampy on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my grampy falls asleep in his chair, we all sneak around him quietly.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom and kindness make him the grampy of our hearts.
meanings.sent5: The image of my grampy's smile is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A nickname for an older man.
meanings.sent1: The old man down the street is known as grampy to all the kids.
meanings.sent2: Everyone respects grampy for his years of experience.
meanings.sent3: Grampy always has a pocket full of candies to share with us.
meanings.sent4: In the neighborhood, grampy's presence is like a comforting shadow.
meanings.sent5: The sound of grampy's laughter echoes through the park.
